item.title: The extent of the 'household exception' to EU data protection law: Is it like Big Brother's Little Brother?
item.description:
Professor Lorna Woods, co-author of “EU Law” by Steiner and Woods, examines a case about data protection and CCTV use. Introduction The Czech Supreme Administrative Court referred a question to the Court of Justice regarding the “household activity” exception in the EU Data Protection Directive. This case, Ryne≈°, involved CCTV footage capturing images beyond the operator’s property, raising questions about the exception’s scope, especially since the Directive states data processing must be “exclusively” for personal and household purposes...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-extent-of-the-household-exception-to-eu-data-protection-law-is-it-like-big-brother-s-little-brother/

item.title: Get Paid to Take a Cell Phone
item.description:
Thinking about a new cell phone but don’t want to spend $100? You don’t have to! Getting a new phone doesn’t mean emptying your wallet. While discounts are common, you can even find completely free phones. It’s true that the newest smartphones can be expensive, but there are plenty of free options available. The key is to shop online instead of in retail stores. Online, you can browse cell phone deals and service plans at your own pace, without pressure from salespeople...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/get-paid-to-take-a-cell-phone/

item.title: Call Overseas For Pennies From Your Cell Phone
item.description:
With cell phones now serving as both personal and business lines, affordable landline long distance isn’t very useful. The real desire is for better rates on mobile phones. Considering you already have domestic calling and internet, the missing piece is inexpensive international calling. TEL3 recognized this trend and developed their TEL3Advantage service for mobile users in the US and Canada. Many people need to call contacts internationally, but affordable mobile options have been limited until now...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/call-overseas-for-pennies-from-your-cell-phone/
